svc@... wrote:

> Hi.
> In beginning of section 4.4.1, we read:
> ############# excerpt begin ###############
>
> 4.4.1. Pre-fetch processing chain
>
>
> The first chain is responsible for investigating if the URI could be
> crawled at this point. That includes checking if all preconditions are met
> (DNS-lookup, fetching robots.txt, authentication). It is also possible to
> completely block the crawling of URIs that have passed through the scope
> check.
>
>
> In the Pre-Processing chain the following two processors should be 
> included
> (or replacement modules that perform similar operations):
>
> ############# excerpt end ###############
>
>
> I suppose, that "In the Pre-Processing chain ...." should read "In the
> Pre-fetch- processing chain ...".

Fixed (Error was also in user manual).
Thanks for reporting.
St.Ack

>
